mods.abstract: A visit to the Tennessee River on the invitation of the Tennessee River Improvement Association, by the Secretary of War, and the Chief of Engineers of the United States Army, the Committee on Commerce of the United States Senate, the Committee on rivers and harbors of the House of Representatives, the representatives in Congress of the States of Tennessee, Alabama, Mississippi, and other states, members of the legislatures of the states of Alabama and Tennessee and various state officials of these states and the general public, to inspect the Great Muscle Shoals project recommended by special boards of U. S. Engineers for adoption by Congress, [Birmingham, Ala.:] [Alabama Paper and Printing Co.] 1915. Edition [46] pages : illustrations (includes portraits, charts) folded map,
